column6:
You will love this home because of its personality and location. It’s centrally located in Arlington. My place is close to restaurants and dining, family–friendly activities, and nightlife. Please note I have two resident cats that live on the property.

Mileage from my home to the following places:
-AT&T Stadium and Texas Rangers stadium – 8 minutes
-Six Flags & Hurricane Harbor – 13 minutes
-Downtown Dallas & Ft. Worth – 30 minutes
-Univ. of Arlington - 3 minutes
column9: Comfortable home, close to stadiums and Six Flags
